info.name: iyzipay
info.description:
iyzico API has been developed to support merchants with extended online payment services and can be easily integrated into existing platforms. All services are based on a stateless RESTful service architecture that requires API clients to access these services (e.g. for data marshalling / unmarshalling and PKI (public key infrastructure) encryption / decryption).

SANDBOX  : sandbox-merchant.iyzipay.com
GITHUB   : github.com/iyzico/iyzipay-php
DEV PAGE : dev.iyzipay.com/en
